ygData.subject: Re:[eqenchanters] where is illusion: halfling?
ygData.msgSnippet: I didn t look in Neriak when I bought all my metal spells.  I can say, I didn t find it in Felwithe or Freeport.  I don t recall looking in Ak Anon.  I did
ygData.messageBody:
I didn't look in Neriak when I bought all my metal spells. I can say, I didn't find it in Felwithe or Freeport. I don't recall looking in Ak'Anon. I did find it in Erudin in the Enchanter guild. I believe it was on the normal illusion vender.

As for "new" illusions, I would like to see Verant put in a special stackable Illusion: Opposite Sex. I can't see any game use for it, but I think it would be kinda neat.
--
Ronh Charming

At Fri, 7 Apr 2000 10:43:33 -0700 (PDT), you wrote:
>
>I can also now confirm that Illusion:Erudite has absolutely no effect
>except putting the spell icon in the corner. There really ought to be an
>"Illusion: Change Face" spell that would randomize the character graphic,
>(and an "Illusion: Leather/Chain/Plate" series that gave some AC and made
>it look like you were wearing armor). Ah, well.
>
>Next question: is Illusion: Halfling available anywhere outside of Erudin?
>I'm Currently based in Freeport (though camped in Highkeep after getting
>my pet), and would like to avoid the trip. I was hoping to find it in
>Neriak, but didn't see it.
>--
>Mark Rafn
